judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB & HARYANA, CHANDIGARH

C.W.P. No. 3880 of 1983
 Date of Decision: August 2,2007
R.S.Kadian

 ........Petitioner
Versus
Union of India and others

..........Respondents
Coram:

 Hon'ble Mr.Justice Rajesh Bindal
Present:
Mr.Gaurav Singh,Advocate for the petitioner.
Mr.Navneet Singh, AAG, Haryana
__
Learned counsel for the petitioner states that the writ
petition may be dismissed as having rendered infructuous.
Ordered accordingly.
(Rajesh Bindal)
Judge
August 29,2007
arya
